sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/ , A.C_USER_GRADE_CD AS userGrade , A.C_JOIN_STATE_CD AS joinStateCd , A.C_PWD_FIND_QUESTION_CD AS pwdFindQuestionCd , A.C_PWD_FIND_ANSWER AS pwdFindAnswer , A.C_PASSWORD AS password , A.C_EMAIL AS email , A.C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , A.C_MAILING_SERVICE_USE_FL AS mailingServiceUseFl , A.C_INDI_INFO_OPEN_FL AS indiInfoOpenFl , A.C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , A.C_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT AS passwordChangeDt , A.C_HOMEPAGE_URL AS homepageUrl , A.C_BLOG_URL AS blogUrl , A.C_SIGN AS sign , A.C_PROFILE_PHOTO AS profilePhoto , A.C_IMAGE_ICON AS imageIcon
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_GRADE_CD AS userGrade , C_JOIN_STATE_CD AS joinStateCd , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_PWD_FIND_QUESTION_CD AS pwdFindQuestionCd , C_PWD_FIND_ANSWER AS pwdFindAnswer , C_MAILING_SERVICE_USE_FL AS mailingServiceUseFl , C_INDI_INFO_OPEN_FL AS indiInfoOpenFl , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT AS passwordChangeDt , C_HOMEPAGE_URL AS homepageUrl , C_BLOG_URL AS blogUrl , C_SIGN AS sign , C_PROFILE_PHOTO AS profilePhoto , C_IMAGE_ICON AS imageIcon FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_USER_GRADE_CD = #userGrade# , C_JOIN_STATE_CD = #joinStateCd# , C_PASSWORD = #password# , C_EMAIL = #email# , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT = #loginFailureCnt# , C_PWD_FIND_QUESTION_CD = #pwdFindQuestionCd# , C_PWD_FIND_ANSWER = #pwdFindAnswer# , C_MAILING_SERVICE_USE_FL = #mailingServiceUseFl# , C_INDI_INFO_OPEN_FL = #indiInfoOpenFl# , C_JOIN_DT = #joinDt# , C_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT = #passwordChangeDt# , C_HOMEPAGE_URL = #homepageUrl# , C_BLOG_URL = #blogUrl# , C_SIGN = #sign# , C_PROFILE_PHOTO = #profilePhoto# , C_IMAGE_ICON = #imageIcon# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_GRADE_CD AS userGrade , C_JOIN_STATE_CD AS joinStateCd , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_PWD_FIND_QUESTION_CD AS pwdFindQuestionCd , C_PWD_FIND_ANSWER AS pwdFindAnswer , C_MAILING_SERVICE_USE_FL AS mailingServiceUseFl , C_INDI_INFO_OPEN_FL AS indiInfoOpenFl , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT AS passwordChangeDt , C_HOMEPAGE_URL AS homepageUrl , C_BLOG_URL AS blogUrl , C_SIGN AS sign , C_PROFILE_PHOTO AS profilePhoto , C_IMAGE_ICON AS imageIcon FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_GRADE_CD AS userGrade , C_JOIN_STATE_CD AS joinStateCd , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_PWD_FIND_QUESTION_CD AS pwdFindQuestionCd , C_PWD_FIND_ANSWER AS pwdFindAnswer , C_MAILING_SERVICE_USE_FL AS mailingServiceUseFl , C_INDI_INFO_OPEN_FL AS indiInfoOpenFl , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT AS passwordChangeDt , C_HOMEPAGE_URL AS homepageUrl , C_BLOG_URL AS blogUrl , C_SIGN AS sign , C_PROFILE_PHOTO AS profilePhoto , C_IMAGE_ICON AS imageIcon FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
